titleStmt.title: Newcastles call, to her neighbour and sister townes and cities throughout the land, to take warning by her sins and sorrowes Lest this overflowing scourge of pestilence reach even unto them also. As also a direction, how to discover such sins as are the procurers of Gods judgments by divers methods. By R. Jenison, Dr. of D. Whereunto is added, the number of them that dyed weekely in Newcastle and Garth-side, from May 6. to December 31. 1636.
titleStmt.author: Jenison, Robert, 1584?-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Coleby, at the signe of the Vnicorne neere to Fleet Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
